name: Fragment: The Railroad
description:
Fragments is an experimental series of little game/side-projects which are freely can be anything.

The Railroad is a short first person and narrative driven atmospheric experience.

This is a slightly updated version of original release.

Game will run in windowed borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution.

System requirements:

  • 64-bit Windows PC that can run UE4 on high settings
  • ~250 Mb free disk space
